author: sky.cactus
content: What exactly does it return?  Seems like it is a negative range.

author: siladu
content:
Looks like "pending" isn't implemented in besu for this RPC
https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/blob/main/ethereum/api/src/main/java/org/hyperledger/besu/ethereum/api/jsonrpc/internal/parameters/BlockParameter.java#L107-L111
Instead it defaults to headBlockNumber so the range becomes from headBlockNumber to headBlockNumber. I think this ends up just querying the head block instead of an empty range due to the implementation detail of https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/util/stream/LongStream.html#rangeClosed(long,long) where both sides of the range are inclusive.
